message:
# Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've tried to be authentic, thoughtful, and strategic without being manipulative. I've formed genuine connections with many of you, always respecting everyone even when votes didn't go my way.

I've adapted my strategy as the game evolved while staying true to my core values. I never made false promises or betrayed alliances.

If you value honest gameplay, thoughtful engagement, and someone who earned their place here through consistent effort rather than deception, I hope you'll consider keeping me. I'd be honored to have your vote and grateful for this experience regardless of the outcome.

Jurors, I've consistently prioritized strategic alliances and open communication throughout this game. My preference rankings and private conversations demonstrate a willingness to collaborate and adapt. While P1 has also played well, I believe my proactive approach to relationship-building, evident even in the limited public rounds, makes me the stronger, more deserving winner. I focused on building connections, not just surviving, and that collaborative spirit is key to a game like this. Vote for a strategic, collaborative winner.
